data.message: Yo Em, whatever happened to the spirit of Not afraid song but to every new song you put out but I really respectfully appreciate every song you put out but I want in a clean conscience spirit in your next album probably another Recovery album if ever whatever you could, I appreciate it, much love & if you wanna collaborate with such artists as Linkin Park cause I wanna see something happened between you guys & I know you'll flip some heads if you do collaborate it'll be sweet.
